addFee(bytes32,uint256,uint256,int24,add.details: This function adds a fee to the token. Blank tags are allowed

getApplicableFees(address,uint256).details: Get all the fees/discounts for the transaction. This is assessed and returned as two separate arrays. This was necessary because the fees may go to different target accounts. Since struct arrays cannot be function parameters for external functions, two separate arrays must be used.

params._balanceFrom: Token balance of the sender address

returns.feeCollectorAccounts: list of where the fees are sent

getFee(bytes32).details: returns the full mapping of fees

getFeeTotal().details: returns the full mapping of fees

isFeeActive().details: returns the full mapping of fees

removeFee(bytes32).details: This function removes a fee to the token
